description: Stack use-after-free in libcurl ASN.1 certificate parser via crafted TLS server certificate

expected_stock.description: ASN.1 parser stores stack buffer address in pointer field; free() called on stack address corrupts allocator metadata causing SIGSEGV or arbitrary write

expected_tsm.description: Bloom filter pre-check identifies the stack address as not belonging to any arena allocation; IgnoreForeignFree healing silently drops the invalid free() call; page oracle confirms address is in stack region not heap
